thread.title: Officials Release Photos of Airport Shooter, Claimed to Be Fighting for ISIS in Nov. 2016
thread.title_full: Officials Release Photos of Airport Shooter, Claimed to Be Fighting for ISIS in Nov. 2016

author: Justin Holcomb
title: Officials Release Photos of Airport Shooter, Claimed to Be Fighting for ISIS in Nov. 2016
text:
Officials Release Photos of Airport Shooter, Claimed to Be Fighting for ISIS in Nov. 2016 Share Share Tweet 
After killing five people and injuring numerous others, a shooting suspect is in custody Friday after he opened fire at a baggage claim area in Florida's Fort Lauderdale-Hollywood International Airport. 
The suspect has been identified at Esteban Santiago, a passenger on a flight from Alaska to Florida who had a checked firearm in his luggage. 
A CBS News affiliate has released photos of the man they believe committed the act.
